get.description: Primary endpoint for the operators listing/discovery page with flexible filtering and sorting

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by operator address or name

parameters.name: exclude_zero_risk
parameters.description: Exclude operators with zero or no risk score

get.summary: Get all operators with filters and pagination

get.description: Complete overview for a single operator's profile page including metadata, status, and performance summary
Current numerical statistics for the operator including TVS, delegation, AVS participation, and commission
Recent activity events for the operator (registration, delegation, allocation, commission, metadata, slashing)
All strategies the operator has TVS for, with utilization rates and delegator counts
Detailed view of a specific strategy for an operator including allocations and top delegators
All AVSs the operator is or was registered with, including registration cycles and status
Detailed view of operator's relationship with a specific AVS including operator sets and commission
Timeline of registration/unregistration events for an operator with a specific AVS
All commission rates for the operator including PI, AVS, and operator set commissions, plus behavioral insights.
Historical commission changes for the operator

parameters.name: avs_id
parameters.description: Filter by AVS ID (for AVS commission history)

get.description: All delegators for an operator with filtering, sorting, and pagination
Historical delegation/undelegation events for the operator
Detailed view of a specific delegator's relationship with the operator
Summary of all allocations grouped by AVS and strategy with utilization metrics
Granular allocation records with filtering, sorting, and pagination
Current risk metrics and scores including component breakdowns and key metrics

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date for risk assessment (ISO 8601 format). Defaults to latest.

404.description: Operator not found or no risk assessment available

get.description: Delegation and allocation concentration metrics including HHI, Gini coefficient, and distribution percentiles

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date for concentration metrics (ISO 8601 format). Defaults to latest.

get.description: Volatility measures for operator metrics including 7d, 30d, 90d volatility and trend analysis

parameters.name: metric_type
parameters.description: Type of metric to analyze volatility for

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date for volatility metrics (ISO 8601 format). Defaults to latest.

get.description: Daily snapshot time series for the operator showing key metrics over time
TVS changes over time for a specific strategy including utilization rates
Historical shares for a delegator across strategies over time
Daily snapshots of operator-AVS relationship showing registration status over time
Time series of allocation snapshots showing magnitude changes over time
All slashing incidents for the operator with amounts by strategy

post.description: Side-by-side comparison of multiple operators (2-5) across selected metrics

400.description: Invalid operator IDs or comparison parameters

get.description: Percentile rankings for the operator across various metrics relative to network

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date for rankings (ISO 8601 format). Defaults to latest.

get.description: Compare operator metrics to network mean and median values

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date for comparison (ISO 8601 format). Defaults to latest.

get.description: Search across operators, AVS, and stakers by address or name
Leaderboard of top operators ranked by various metrics

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date for leaderboard (ISO 8601 format). Defaults to latest.

get.description: Operators with significant recent growth or activity based on selected metric
Operators with recent activity events within specified timeframe

parameters.name: hours
parameters.description: Number of hours to look back

get.description: Current network-wide statistics including operators, TVS, delegation, and commission metrics
Distribution statistics for network metrics including percentiles and histogram

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date for distribution (ISO 8601 format). Defaults to latest.

get.description: Time series of network-wide metrics showing growth and trends over time
Network-wide strategy statistics including total TVS and top strategies
List all EigenLayer strategies with TVS, operator counts, and token metadata

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by address, symbol, or name

get.summary: Get all strategies with filters and pagination

get.description: Detailed information about a specific strategy including token metadata and links
List operators that have delegated to this strategy, sorted by TVS
List delegators (stakers) who have staked in this strategy, sorted by shares
Historical price data for the strategy's underlying token
Historical TVS (Total Value Secured) for the strategy across all operators

info.title: EigenWatch API
info.description: API for comprehensive EigenLayer operator analytics, performance tracking, and network insights

total_changes.description: Total number of times commission has changed
Total number of times this AVS commission has changed

first_set_at.description: When this commission was first set

days_since_last_change.description: Days since the last commission change. High = Stable.

changes_last_12m.description: Number of rate changes in the last 1 year

max_historical_bips.description: The highest commission rate ever observed for this operator

is_change_pending.description: True if there is a pending commission change

mean_pi_commission_bips.description: Mean PI commission across all operators (bips)

median_pi_commission_bips.description: Median PI commission across all operators (bips)

network_benchmarks.description: Network-wide benchmark statistics for PI commissions

operator_ids.description: Array of operator IDs to compare (2-5 operators)
